title: Trump v. Hawaii - The White House's travel ban heads to the Supreme Court
description: The Supreme Court is about to hear arguments on President Trump's travel ban. Josh Geltzer, a former Senior Director on the National Security Council, sits down with Chuck to explain what's at stake.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
